item.description:
A Musical Mystery show by Betsy fishman and arlyn Valencia.
An Original show featuring parodies of favorite broadway songs from shows such as Rent, Sound of Music, Cinderella, Beaty n' the Beast, South Pacific and Damn Yankees.
The Premise: It's the annual Bake Off with a love potion on the loose and the stolen Dennison Diamonds turning up in the desserts, will a winner ever emerge? for whom was the potion originally intended?
And who stole the jewelry? The audience will solve the mystery!
For reservations, Please call 508-875-5218
item.name: Just Desserts
